text: Tenders for the construction of the building for the new government medical college sanctioned for Pudukottai district would be called soon, C.Vijayabaskar, Minister for Health, said here on Monday. Speaking at the launch of an additional ambulance service at the Dr.Muthulakshmi Reddy Memorial Government Hospital, he said Chief Minister Jayalalithaa would lay the foundation stone for the new college soon. He said that steps were being taken to reduce the response time (in reaching accident spots) of the 108 ambulances to 10 minutes from the current average of 13 minutes in Tamil Nadu. N. Subramanian, Minister for Adi Dravida Welfare, inaugurated the service.
title: Additional ambulance service launched
